recordings.liveAgo_context: For live streams showing when recording started. Shows 'started recording 15 minutes ago'
recordings.recordedAgo_context: For recorded streams showing when recording was made. Shows 'recorded 3 days ago'

deleteConfirm.title: Delete video
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this video? This action cannot be undone.

followers.addedAgo_context: For when a creator was added to user's list. Shows 'Added 3 days ago'
